dialogStrings:
President Shinra
“Hmm…
So you all must be…
What was it?”

{Barret}
“AVALANCHE!
And don't ya forget it!
So you're President Shinra, huh?”

President Shinra
“…Long time no see?
Oh…you.”{PAUSE}“You're the one who quit SOLDIER
and joined AVALANCHE.
I knew you'd been exposed to Mako,
from the look in your eyes…”{PAUSE}“Tell me, traitor…
what was your name?”

President Shinra
“Forgive me for asking,
but I can't be expected to
remember everyone's name.”{PAUSE}“Unless you become
another Sephiroth.”

President Shinra
“Aah, Sephiroth…
He was brilliant.
Perhaps too brilliant.”

{Barret}
“Don't give a damn 'bout none of that!
This place's goin' up with a big BANG soon!
Serves y'all right!”

President Shinra
“And such a waste of good fireworks,
just to get rid of vermin like you…”

{Barret}
“VERMIN!?
That's all you can say? VERMIN!?”{PAUSE}“Shinra're the VERMIN, for
killing the Planet!
Guess that'd make you King VERMIN!
So shu'up jackass!”

President Shinra
“…You are beginning to bore me.”{PAUSE}“I'm a very busy man,
so if you'll excuse me…
I have a dinner I must attend.”

{Barret}
“Dinner!? Don't gimme that!
I ain't even started wit' you yet!”

President Shinra
“But, I've made arrangements for
a playmate for you all.”

President Shinra
“Now then,
if you'll excuse me.”

President Shinra
“Meet 'Airbuster', a techno-soldier.
Our Weapon Development Department
created him.”{PAUSE}“I'm sure the data he'll extract from
your dead bodies will be of great
use to us in future experiments.”

{Barret}
“I don't care what it is!!
I'm gonna bust him up!”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}!
Please don't die! You can't die!
There's still so much I want to tell you!”

{Barret}
“Hey, you gonna be alright?”
{CHOICE}(Be strong)
{CHOICE}(I don't know if I can hold on)

{Cloud}
“…”{PAUSE}“You worry about yourselves!
I'm all right,
but take care of {Tifa}!”

{Cloud}
“Stop talkin' like this is the end!”

{Barret}
“Don't go cryin' like a woman.
There ain't nothin' I can do for ya.
Ya gotta do it on your own.”
